50084.en: <voice 00025_00050084><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Sorry to just barge in.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50084.ja: <voice 00025_00050084><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「じゃまするぞい。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50085.en: <voice 00335_00050085><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>Ah, if it isn't Hollow!<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50085.ja: <voice 00335_00050085><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>「あらん。賢者ホーローさま！<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50085.ko: <voice 00335_00050085><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>: 어머나, 현자 호로 님!<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50085.zh-Hans: <voice 00335_00050085><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>哎呀，是贤者霍洛大人！<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50085.zh-Hant: <voice 00335_00050085><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>哎呀，是賢者霍洛大人！<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50086.en:
<voice 00365_00050086><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>The fact that you came all this way must
mean...<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50086.ja:
<voice 00365_00050086><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>「わざわざ　お越しいただいたということは
　……もしかして？<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50086.ko:
<voice 00365_00050086><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>: 여기까지 오셨다는 건
　……설마?<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50086.zh-Hans:
<voice 00365_00050086><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>您专程来到这里……
难道是？<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50086.zh-Hant:
<voice 00365_00050086><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>您專程來到這裡……
難道是？<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50087.en: <voice 00435_00050087><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Aye! At last, the Magic Compass is completed!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50087.ja:
<voice 00435_00050087><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「うむ！
　ついに　魔法の羅針盤が　完成したぞい！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50087.ko:
<voice 00435_00050087><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 그래!
　드디어 마법의 나침반이 완성됐네!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50087.zh-Hans:
<voice 00435_00050087><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>嗯！
魔法罗盘终于完成了！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50087.zh-Hant:
<voice 00435_00050087><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>嗯！
魔法羅盤終於完成了！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50088.en:
<voice 00655_00050088><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>With this compass, not even that thick mist
will stop the Grand Titus from gettin' to
Lendersia.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50088.ja:
<voice 00655_00050088><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「これがあれば　いかに　迷いの霧といえども
　グランドタイタス号のレンダーシア到着を
　阻むことは　できまいて。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50088.ko:
<voice 00655_00050088><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 이게 있으면 아무리 미혹의 안개라 한들
　그랜드 타이터스호의 렌더시아 도착을
　막을 순 없을 테지.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50088.zh-Hans:
<voice 00655_00050088><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>只要有了这个，就算是迷失之雾，
也无法阻碍大巨人号
抵达冷达西亚。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50088.zh-Hant:
<voice 00655_00050088><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>只要有了這個，就算是迷途之霧，
也無法阻礙大巨人號抵達冷達西亞。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50089.en:
<voice 00760_00050089><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>It may look like just a normal compass now,
but just wait until we enter that mist...
Ye'll see what it can do!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50089.ja:
<voice 00760_00050089><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「今は　ただの羅針盤に見えるやもしれんが
　レンダーシアを包む　迷いの霧に突入した時
　この羅針盤の　威力を知ることになるじゃろう。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50089.ko:
<voice 00760_00050089><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 지금은 평범한 나침반으로 보이겠지만
　렌더시아를 둘러싼 미혹의 안개 속에 들어가면
　이 나침반의 진가를 알게 될 걸세.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50089.zh-Hans:
<voice 00760_00050089><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>或许现在看起来只是一个普通的罗盘，
但是进入笼罩冷达西亚的迷失之雾后，
就能感受到这个罗盘的威力了。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50089.zh-Hant:
<voice 00760_00050089><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>或許現在看起來只是一個普通的羅盤，
但是進入籠罩冷達西亞的迷途之霧後，
就能感受到這個羅盤的威力了。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50090.en:
<voice 00900_00050090><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>How lovely! Spectacular! Finally, the day
has come where the Grand Titus can make
another voyage to Lendersia!<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50090.ja:
<voice 00900_00050090><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>「いやん！　最高だわ！
　グランドタイタス号が　また
　レンダーシアに旅立てる日が　ついに来たのね！<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50090.ko:
<voice 00900_00050090><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>: 세상에! 정말 끝내주네요!
　마침내 그랜드 타이터스호가 다시
　렌더시아로 떠날 날이 왔군요!<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50090.zh-Hans:
<voice 00900_00050090><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>天啊！太棒了！
大巨人号终于又迎来了
驶向冷达西亚的这一天！<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50090.zh-Hant:
<voice 00900_00050090><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>天啊！太棒了！
大巨人號終於又迎來了
駛向冷達西亞的這一天！<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50091.en:
<voice 01026_00050091><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>Thank you so much, Mister Hollow!
You are truly the best! <heart><stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50091.ja:
<voice 01026_00050091><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>「ありがとう　賢者ホーローさま<heart>
　あなたって最高！<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50091.ko:
<voice 01026_00050091><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>: 감사합니다, 현자 호로 님<heart>
　현자님이 최고예요!<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50091.zh-Hans:
<voice 01026_00050091><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>谢谢您，贤者霍洛大人<heart>
您是最棒的！<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50091.zh-Hant:
<voice 01026_00050091><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>謝謝您，賢者霍洛大人<heart>
您是最棒的！<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50092.en:
<voice 01256_00050092><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>A-hem. I'd better get moving and get this
loaded onto the ship! The Grand Titus will
be sailing in no time flat!<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50092.ja:
<voice 01256_00050092><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>「ああん。こうしちゃいられないわ。
　あたし　船に　これを届けにいってくる！
　グランドタイタス号を　すぐに出港させるわよ！<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50092.ko:
<voice 01256_00050092><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>: 참, 이러고 있을 때가 아니지.
　난 이걸 배에 갖다 주고 올게!
　바로 그랜드 타이터스호를 출항시키겠어!<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50092.zh-Hans:
<voice 01256_00050092><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>噢噢，差点忘了还有其他事情要做。
我去把这个罗盘送到船上！
好让大巨人号马上出港！<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50092.zh-Hant:
<voice 01256_00050092><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>噢噢，差點忘了還有其他事情要做。
我去把這個羅盤送到船上！
好讓大巨人號馬上出港！<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50093.en:
<voice 01441_00050093><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>How're ye faring, <pc>?
Ye' lookin' just as vivid and lively as ever!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50093.ja:
<voice 01441_00050093><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「元気でおったか　<pc>。
　相変わらず　ビビッドかつ　ユニークな
　顔立ちじゃのう。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50093.ko:
<voice 01441_00050093><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 잘 지냈나, <pc>?
　여전히 비비드하고 유니크한
　얼굴이로구먼.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50093.zh-Hans:
<voice 01441_00050093><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>近来可好？<pc>
你的容貌看起来
还是这么活泼又独特啊。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50093.zh-Hant:
<voice 01441_00050093><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>近來可好？<pc>
你的容貌看起來
還是這麼活潑又獨特啊。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50094.en:
<voice 01481_00050094><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>You didn't forget me, right? I'm Hollow, the
wandering sage! And there is nothing in
Astoltia I don't know.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50094.ja:
<voice 01481_00050094><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「まさか　わしのことを　忘れちゃいまいな？
　アストルティアに　知らぬことなし！
　放浪の賢者　ホーローじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50094.ko:
<voice 01481_00050094><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 설마 날 잊은 것은 아니겠지?
　아스톨티아에 대해 모르는 것이 없는!
　떠돌이 현자 호로일세.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50094.zh-Hans:
<voice 01481_00050094><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>你该不会把我忘了吧？
我就是雅斯特露琪亚的活百科，
流浪的贤者霍洛！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50094.zh-Hant:
<voice 01481_00050094><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>你該不會把我忘了吧？
我是對雅斯特露琪亞無所不知！
流浪的賢者霍洛。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50095.en: <voice 01581_00050095><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>...You didn't forget, did you?<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50095.ja: <voice 01581_00050095><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「……で　おぬし　覚えておろうな？<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50095.ko: <voice 01581_00050095><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: ……그런데 자네, 그건 기억하지?<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50095.zh-Hans: <voice 01581_00050095><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……你还记得吧？<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50095.zh-Hant: <voice 01581_00050095><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……你還記得吧？<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50098.en:
<voice 01777_00050098><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Sorry, <if_woman>lassie<else>laddie<endif>. Looks like I wasn't clear
enough.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50098.ja:
<voice 01777_00050098><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「……むっ　言葉足らずだったようじゃな。
　すまん　すまん。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50098.ko:
<voice 01777_00050098><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: ……음, 내가 너무 막연한 질문을 한 것 같군.
　이거 미안하게 됐네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50098.zh-Hans:
<voice 01777_00050098><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>唔……看来我说得不够清楚，
抱歉、抱歉。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50098.zh-Hant:
<voice 01777_00050098><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>唔……看來我說得不夠清楚，
抱歉、抱歉。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50099.en:
<voice 01817_00050099><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Just checkin' to make sure that you remembered
the Hero Princess I told you about in the
Landon Mountains.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50099.ja:
<voice 01817_00050099><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「わしが　確認したかったのは
　前に　ランドン山脈で話した　勇者姫のことを
　覚えておるかということじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50099.ko:
<voice 01817_00050099><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 내가 묻고 싶었던 건 전에
　랭든산맥에서 얘기한 용사 공주에 대해
　기억하고 있냐는 뜻이었네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50099.zh-Hans:
<voice 01817_00050099><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>我想问的是，
你还记得我之前在兰顿山脉跟你说过，
关于勇者公主的事吗？<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50099.zh-Hant:
<voice 01817_00050099><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>我想問的是，
你還記得我之前在蘭頓山脈跟你說過，
關於勇者公主的事嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50100.en:
<voice 01927_00050100><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>That bright light that shone from Lendersia that one
day. You saw it cover the entire world, didn't ye?<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50100.ja:
<voice 01927_00050100><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「かつて　レンダーシアから放たれた　白い光。
　あの　世界を包んだ　奇跡の光を
　おぬしも　見たじゃろう？<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50100.ko:
<voice 01927_00050100><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 렌더시아에서 뿜어져 나온 하얀 빛.
　온 세상을 뒤덮은 그 기적의 빛을
　자네도 봤지?<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50100.zh-Hans:
<voice 01927_00050100><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>以前从冷达西亚绽放出的那道白光，
也就是笼罩世界的那道奇迹之光，
你不是也看到了吗？<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50100.zh-Hant:
<voice 01927_00050100><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>以前從冷達西亞綻放出的那道白光，
也就是籠罩世界的那道奇蹟之光，
你不是也看到了嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50101.en:
<voice 02007_00050101><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>That light signals the awakening of the
princess of Gran Zedora, the greatest kingdom
in all of Lendersia.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50101.ja:
<voice 02007_00050101><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「あれこそが　レンダーシアの大国
　グランゼドーラ王国の　王女が
　勇者として覚醒した時に　放った光なのじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50101.ko:
<voice 02007_00050101><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 그 빛은 바로 렌더시아의 대국
　그랑제도라 왕국의 공주가
　용사로 각성할 때 뿜어져 나온 것이라네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50101.zh-Hans:
<voice 02007_00050101><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>那正是冷达西亚的大国，
古兰泽朵拉王国的公主，
以勇者身份觉醒时绽放出来的光芒。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50101.zh-Hant:
<voice 02007_00050101><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>那正是冷達西亞的大國，
古蘭澤朵拉王國的公主，
以勇者身分覺醒時綻放出來的光芒。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50102.en:
<voice 02217_00050102><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>When the world finds itself in danger, a hero
shall awaken in a great light...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50102.ja:
<voice 02217_00050102><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「世界に危機が訪れし時
　大いなる光とともに　勇者は目覚める……。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50102.ko:
<voice 02217_00050102><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 세계에 위기가 닥쳤을 때
　위대한 빛과 함께 용사가 깨어난다…….<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50102.zh-Hans:
<voice 02217_00050102><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>当世界面临危机时，
勇者会伴随着耀眼的光芒觉醒……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50102.zh-Hant:
<voice 02217_00050102><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>當世界面臨危機時，
勇者會伴隨著偉大之光覺醒……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75029.en: <voice 02302_00075029><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Her name is Anlucia...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75029.ja: <voice 02302_00075029><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「その名を　勇者姫アンルシアという……。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75029.ko: <voice 02302_00075029><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 그 이름을 용사 공주 안루시아라고 하지…….<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75029.zh-Hans: <voice 02302_00075029><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>她就是勇者公主安露西雅……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75029.zh-Hant: <voice 02302_00075029><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>其名叫做勇者公主安露西亞……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50103.en:
<voice 02337_00050103><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>I'd like you to help her any way you can.
Cross the sea to the kingdom of Gran Zedora
so that you can meet her.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50103.ja:
<voice 02337_00050103><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「おぬしには　姫君の手助けを頼みたい。
　勇者姫に会うため　海を渡り
　グランゼドーラ王国へ　行ってくれい。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50103.ko:
<voice 02337_00050103><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 자네가 바로 그 공주를 도와주었으면 하네.
　용사 공주를 만나기 위해 바다를 건너
　그랑제도라 왕국으로 가 주게.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50103.zh-Hans:
<voice 02337_00050103><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>我想拜托你去帮助公主。
渡海到古兰泽朵拉王国，
去见勇者公主吧。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50103.zh-Hant:
<voice 02337_00050103><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>我想拜託你去幫助公主。
渡海到古蘭澤朵拉王國，
去見勇者公主吧。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50104.en:
<voice 02397_00050104><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>There's no moment to lose! Get yer bearings
and go on and board the Grand Titus!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50104.ja:
<voice 02397_00050104><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「もはや　一刻の猶予もない。
　すぐに　準備を整えて
　グランドタイタス号に　乗り込むのじゃ！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50104.ko:
<voice 02397_00050104><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 이제는 더 지체할 시간이 없어.
　어서 준비를 마치고
　그랜드 타이터스호에 타게나!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50104.zh-Hans:
<voice 02397_00050104><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>形势刻不容缓。
快点做好准备，
登上大巨人号吧！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50104.zh-Hant:
<voice 02397_00050104><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>形勢刻不容緩。
快點做好準備，
登上大巨人號吧！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50105.ja: <voice 02639_00050105><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>「ただいま～！<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50105.ko: <voice 02639_00050105><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>: 나 왔어~!<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50105.zh-Hans: <voice 02639_00050105><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>我回来了～！<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50105.zh-Hant: <voice 02639_00050105><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>我回來了～！<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50106.en:
<voice 02828_00050106><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>Good news. Both the ship and crew are ready to leave
at moment's notice!<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50106.ja:
<voice 02828_00050106><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>「聞いてちょうだい。
　船も　クルーたちも　準備万端！
　今すぐにでも　出港できるそうよ。<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50106.ko:
<voice 02828_00050106><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>: 다들, 들어 봐.
　배도 선원들도 모두 준비됐어!
　당장이라도 출항할 수 있대.<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50106.zh-Hans:
<voice 02828_00050106><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>你们听我说。
船和船员们都已准备就绪！
现在即刻就能出港了。<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50106.zh-Hant:
<voice 02828_00050106><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>你們聽我說。
船和船員們都已準備就緒！
現在即刻就能出港了。<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50107.en:
<voice 02888_00050107><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>Before you board, make sure to show your
boarding pass to a sailor named Crain. He'll
be near the front of the ship.<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50107.ja:
<voice 02888_00050107><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>「グランドタイタス号に乗る時は
　船の前にいる　クレインっていう船員に
　タイタス号乗船パスを　見せてね。<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50107.ko:
<voice 02888_00050107><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>: 그랜드 타이터스호에 타려면
　배 앞에 있는 크레인이라는 선원한테
　타이터스호 승선 패스를 보여 주면 돼.<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50107.zh-Hans:
<voice 02888_00050107><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>搭乘大巨人号时，
得出示大巨人号乘船证
给船前方那位叫克莱恩的船员看哦。<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50107.zh-Hant:
<voice 02888_00050107><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>搭乘大巨人號時，
得出示大巨人號乘船證
給船前方那位叫克雷因的船員看喔。<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50108.en:
<voice 02978_00050108><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Well, safe travels to you, <pc>.
I'll see ya' again when the tracks of destiny cross!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50108.ja:
<voice 02978_00050108><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「では　さらばじゃ。<pc>。
　運命の線路が交差するとき　また会おう！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50108.ko:
<voice 02978_00050108><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 그럼 잘 가게, <pc>.
　운명의 선로가 교차할 때 다시 만나세!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50108.zh-Hans:
<voice 02978_00050108><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>那么再见了，<pc>。
待命运之轨再度交汇时再见吧！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50108.zh-Hant:
<voice 02978_00050108><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>那麼再見了，<pc>。
待命運之軌再度交會時再見吧！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50109.en:
<voice 00050_00050109><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>Hey, fella'! If ya wanna board the Grand Titus, do
I gotta deal for you! I got one boarding pass left
with yer name on it!<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50109.ja:
<voice 00050_00050109><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>「お兄さーん！
　グランドタイタス号に　乗りたいなら
　乗船パスあるよっ。最後の１枚だよっ！<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50109.ko:
<voice 00050_00050109><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>: 형씨~!
　그랜드 타이터스호에 타려고?
　승선 패스 있는데. 딱 1장 남았어!<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50109.zh-Hans:
<voice 00050_00050109><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>这位小哥！
如果你想搭乘大巨人号，
我有乘船证。这可是最后一张哦！<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50109.zh-Hant:
<voice 00050_00050109><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>這位小哥！
如果你想搭乘大巨人號，
我有乘船證。這可是最後一張喔！<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50110.en:
<voice 00285_00050110><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>She's been outta commission for awhile now
'cuz of the repairs, but now she's ready to
sail again, fit as a fiddle!<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50110.ja:
<voice 00285_00050110><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>「この船は　もう長い間
　修理のために　運航休止してたんだけど
　それが終わって　ついに　運航再開するんだ！！<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50110.ko:
<voice 00285_00050110><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>: 이 배, 수리하느라
　한참 동안 운항이 중지됐다가
　겨우 수리를 마치고 운항을 재개한 참이거든!!<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50110.zh-Hans:
<voice 00285_00050110><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>这艘船停航了
很长一段时间进行修理，
现在修好了，终于能重新启航了！<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50110.zh-Hant:
<voice 00285_00050110><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>這艘船停航了
很長一段時間進行修理，
現在修好了，終於能重新啟航了！<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50111.en:
<voice 00390_00050111><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>It's the first trip since she reopened, so
a lot of folks'll be wantin' on! Ya can't get
this pass from just anywhere, ya know!<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50111.ja:
<voice 00390_00050111><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>「記念すべき　リニューアル後の　初出港だよ！
　乗りたい人が多すぎて　他では
　もう入手できない　貴重なパスだ！<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50111.ko:
<voice 00390_00050111><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>: 새 단장 하고 처음 출항하는 거라고!
　타고 싶어 하는 사람이 많아서
　다른 데서는 구경도 못 하는 귀한 패스야!<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50111.zh-Hans:
<voice 00390_00050111><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>这是翻修后的首次启航，相当值得纪念！
想乘船的人太多了，乘船证非常珍贵，
在别处已经弄不到了！<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50111.zh-Hant:
<voice 00390_00050111><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>這是翻修後的首次啟航，相當值得紀念！
想乘船的人太多了，乘船證非常珍貴，
在別處已經弄不到了！<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50112.en:
<voice 00440_00050112><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>But do I got a special deal for you, my good
pal! 100,000 Gold and it's a done deal!
Well? Whaddya say?<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50112.ja:
<voice 00440_00050112><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>「その超レアな　最後の１枚を
　お兄さんになら　特別に　たったの
　１０万ゴールドで　ゆずってもいいぜ？<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50112.ko:
<voice 00440_00050112><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>: 그 엄청나게 귀한 패스가 딱 1장 남았는데
　내가 형씨한테는 특별히
　단돈 10만 골드에 팔아 줄게.<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50112.zh-Hans:
<voice 00440_00050112><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>而我手上刚好有极其珍贵的最后一张票。
看在我和你的缘分上，
特别用１０万Ｇ便宜卖给你怎么样？<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50112.zh-Hant:
<voice 00440_00050112><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>而我手上剛好有極其珍貴的最後一張票。
看在我和你的緣分上，
特別用１０萬Ｇ便宜賣給你怎麼樣？<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50114.en:
<voice 00675_00050114><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>I know ya have an appreciation for the finer
things, like this pass! O' course I can tell.
I gots a sixth sense to these kinda things!<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50114.ja:
<voice 00675_00050114><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>「お兄さんの　その高貴な顔立ち！
　どこぞの貴族さまと　お見受けしたぜ。
　オレぁ　人を見る目にゃ　自信があるんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50114.ko:
<voice 00675_00050114><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>: 형씨, 그 귀티 나는 얼굴을 보아하니
　어디 귀족 나리인 모양이지?
　내가 사람 보는 눈 하나는 정확하거든.<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50114.zh-Hans:
<voice 00675_00050114><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>一看长相就知道你出身高贵！
你是哪里的贵族吧。
我啊，可是很有看人的眼光。<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50114.zh-Hant:
<voice 00675_00050114><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>一看長相就知道你出身高貴！
你是哪裡的貴族吧。
我啊，可是很有看人的眼光。<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50115.en:
<voice 00735_00050115><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>I'm doin' you a huge favor here! But ya'
gotta act fast, I got other people waitin'!
It's truly a great deal. Well?<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50115.ja:
<voice 00735_00050115><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>「絶対　損させないからよっ！
　ササッと決断して　オレから
　乗船パスを買うのが　お得だぜ？<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50115.ko:
<voice 00735_00050115><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>: 절대 등쳐 먹는 거 아니니까!
　후딱 결정해서 나한테
　승선 패스를 사는 게 그쪽한테도 좋을걸?<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50115.zh-Hans:
<voice 00735_00050115><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>绝对不会让你吃亏的！
你赶快决定吧，
跟我买乘船证的话，可以省很多钱哦。<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50115.zh-Hant:
<voice 00735_00050115><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>絕對不會讓你吃虧的！
你趕快決定吧，
跟我買乘船證的話，可以省很多錢喔。<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50117.en:
<voice 01203_00050117><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>Attaboy! You have a good eye!! Heheheh... Pleasure
doin' business with ya!!<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50117.ja:
<voice 01203_00050117><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>「いやあ　さすがっ！
　貴族さまは　お目が高いっ！！
　へっへっへ……　まいどあり～っ！！<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50117.ko:
<voice 01203_00050117><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>: 이야~ 역시!
　귀족 나리는 보는 눈이 있다니까!!
　헤헤헤…… 고맙수다~!!<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50117.zh-Hans:
<voice 01203_00050117><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>哎呀，真不愧是贵族！
果然有眼光！
嘿嘿……谢谢惠顾！<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50117.zh-Hant:
<voice 01203_00050117><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>哎呀，真不愧是貴族！
果然有眼光！
嘿嘿……謝謝惠顧！<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50119.en:
<voice 01463_00050119><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>Whaddya think you're tryin' to pull here!?
This ain't nearly enough! Come on,
cough up the rest!<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50119.ja:
<voice 01463_00050119><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>「おいっ　あんた！
　今は　こんな　はしたガネじゃ買えねえんだよ！
　あと１００倍　よこしやがれっ！！<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50119.ko:
<voice 01463_00050119><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>: 이봐, 당신!
　지금은 이따위 푼돈으로는 못 산다고!
　100배 더 내놔!!<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50119.zh-Hans:
<voice 01463_00050119><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>喂，臭小子！
现在这点小钱可是买不到乘船证的！
你还得再给我加个１００倍！<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50119.zh-Hant:
<voice 01463_00050119><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>喂，臭小子！
現在這點小錢可是買不到乘船證的！
你還得再給我加個１００倍！<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50120.en: <voice 01743_00050120><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>...W-what are you!?<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50120.ja: <voice 01743_00050120><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>「……な　なんだ！？<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50120.zh-Hans: <voice 01743_00050120><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>……你、你想怎样？！<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50120.zh-Hant: <voice 01743_00050120><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>……你、你想怎樣！？<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50123.en:
<voice 02558_00050123><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>Deheheh... So sorry! You already paid me in advance,
didn't ya!<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50123.ja:
<voice 02558_00050123><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>「でへへ。こりゃ　本当に失礼しやしたっ。
　あなたさまからは　たんまりと
　前金を　いただいておりましたねっ！<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50123.ko:
<voice 02558_00050123><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>: 으헤헤, 정말 실례가 많았습니다.
　그쪽한테는 이미
　두둑이 선금을 받았었죠!<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50123.zh-Hans:
<voice 02558_00050123><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>耶嘿嘿，看我这记性，失礼了。
我早就从您那里
拿了一大笔订金了呀！<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50123.zh-Hant:
<voice 02558_00050123><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>耶嘿嘿，看我這記性，失禮了。
我早就從您那裡
拿了一大筆訂金了呀！<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50124.en:
<voice 02645_00050124><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>Here, please take it! Yer shiny new Titus Boarding
Pass!<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50124.ja:
<voice 02645_00050124><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>「さあ　どうぞ　どうぞ。
　こちらが　タイタス号乗船パスでございます。
　お納めくださいっ！<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50124.ko:
<voice 02645_00050124><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>: 자, 여기 있습니다.
　이게 타이터스호 승선 패스입니다.
　받으십쇼!<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50124.zh-Hans:
<voice 02645_00050124><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>来，您请拿去。
这是大巨人号的乘船证，
您请收下！<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50124.zh-Hant:
<voice 02645_00050124><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>來，您請拿去。
這是大巨人號的乘船證，
您請收下！<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50125.en: <voice 03033_00050125><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Is the ship all ready to leave?<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50125.ja: <voice 03033_00050125><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「もう　船が出るのですね。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50125.ko: <voice 03033_00050125><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 이제 출발하는 모양이군요.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50125.zh-Hans: <voice 03033_00050125><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>船要出发了吧。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50125.zh-Hant: <voice 03033_00050125><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>船要出發了吧。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50126.en: <voice 03108_00050126><start_lip_sync n00911 _normal m00001>Yes, sir. Please board right away.<stop_lip_animation n00911 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50126.ja: <voice 03108_00050126><start_lip_sync n00911 _normal m00001>「はい。お急ぎください。<stop_lip_animation n00911 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50126.ko: <voice 03108_00050126><start_lip_sync n00911 _normal m00001>: 예, 어서 타세요.<stop_lip_animation n00911 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50126.zh-Hans: <voice 03108_00050126><start_lip_sync n00911 _normal m00001>没错。您快上船吧。<stop_lip_animation n00911 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50126.zh-Hant: <voice 03108_00050126><start_lip_sync n00911 _normal m00001>沒錯，您快上船吧。<stop_lip_animation n00911 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50127.en: <voice 03572_00050127><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>H-huh!?... The ship's horn? It's leavin' already?<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50127.ja:
<voice 03572_00050127><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>「あ　あれっ！？　……汽笛？
　もう出港の時間になったのか？<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50127.ko:
<voice 03572_00050127><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>: 어, 어라!? ……기적?
　벌써 출항 시간이야?<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50127.zh-Hans:
<voice 03572_00050127><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>诶、诶？！……汽笛声？
已经要开船了吗？<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50127.zh-Hant:
<voice 03572_00050127><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>誒、誒！？……汽笛聲？
已經要開船了嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50128.en:
<voice 03648_00050128><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>Where in blazes is my boarding pass!? Ah? Ahhh!?...
And where did this money come from?<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50128.ja:
<voice 03648_00050128><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>「オレの乗船パスは　どこだ！？
　あれ？　あれれっ！？
　……このカネは　なんだ？<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50128.ko:
<voice 03648_00050128><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>: 내 승선 패스가 어디 갔지!?
　어? 어어!?
　……이 돈은 뭐야?<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50128.zh-Hans:
<voice 03648_00050128><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>我的乘船证去哪里了？
奇怪？到哪里去了？？
……这个钱又是怎么回事？<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50128.zh-Hant:
<voice 03648_00050128><start_lip_sync n02026 _normal m00001>我的乘船證去哪裡了？
奇怪？到哪裡去了？？
……這個錢又是怎麼回事？<stop_lip_animation n02026 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50129.en:
<voice 04067_00050129><start_lip_sync n00911 _normal m00001>Attention all passengers, that was the departure
signal. Please hurry on board.<stop_lip_animation n00911 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50129.ja:
<voice 04067_00050129><start_lip_sync n00911 _normal m00001>「お客さま。
　出港の合図です。船内へ　お急ぎください。<stop_lip_animation n00911 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50129.ko:
<voice 04067_00050129><start_lip_sync n00911 _normal m00001>: 손님.
　출항 신호입니다. 어서 배에 타세요.<stop_lip_animation n00911 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50129.zh-Hans:
<voice 04067_00050129><start_lip_sync n00911 _normal m00001>这位乘客。
这是准备启航的通知，请您尽快上船。<stop_lip_animation n00911 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50129.zh-Hant:
<voice 04067_00050129><start_lip_sync n00911 _normal m00001>這位乘客。
這是準備啟航的通知，請您盡快上船。<stop_lip_animation n00911 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50130.en:
<voice 04112_00050130><start_lip_sync n00911 _normal m00001>Look at all the crowds of people that have come to
see the Grand Titus off. Please wave to them from the
rear deck.<stop_lip_animation n00911 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50130.ja:
<voice 04112_00050130><start_lip_sync n00911 _normal m00001>「グランドタイタス号の船出を　ひと目見ようと
　大勢の人たちが　見送りにきているようです。
　ぜひ　後部デッキから　応えてあげてください。<stop_lip_animation n00911 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50130.ko:
<voice 04112_00050130><start_lip_sync n00911 _normal m00001>: 그랜드 타이터스호의 출항을 보려고
　많은 사람들이 배웅하러 나온 모양입니다.
　여러분도 후방 갑판에서 인사해 주세요.<stop_lip_animation n00911 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50130.zh-Hans:
<voice 04112_00050130><start_lip_sync n00911 _normal m00001>为了目睹大巨人号离港，
很多人来送行。
请您去后部甲板跟他们挥挥手吧。<stop_lip_animation n00911 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50130.zh-Hant:
<voice 04112_00050130><start_lip_sync n00911 _normal m00001>為了目睹大巨人號離港，
有很多人來送行。
請您去後部甲板跟他們揮揮手吧。<stop_lip_animation n00911 CLOSE_MOUTH>
